name: Sacred 2 Gold

files.setup: N/A:Select the Windows installer downloaded from GOG

content:
files:
- setup: N/A:Select the Windows installer downloaded from GOG
game:
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Sacred 2 Gold/system/sacred2.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: vcrun2005 physx win7
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    args: /SP- /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES /NOCANCEL
    executable: setup
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  env:
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE: 1
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE_PATH: $GAMEDIR
